item.title: 周日清晨，一名警长在纽约巴达维亚唐斯博彩酒店（Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel）制止一起纠纷时遇袭身亡，当局称已逮捕两人。
item.description:
Two arrests have been made following the death of a sheriff's sergeant who was attacked and killed after breaking up a dispute early Sunday morning at New York’s Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel, authorities say. https://t.co/adsb6jMN0D

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 明天：@GMA 独家报道：7 岁女孩在佛罗里达海滩被沙子掩埋后死亡，其父母向 @eriellereshef 表示："当我们去海滩时，我们会想到水上安全。我从来没有想过这件事"。他们希望其他父母知道的事情以及更多。
item.description:
TOMORROW: A @GMA EXCLUSIVE: Parents of 7-year-old girl who died after getting buried in sand at Florida beach speak out to @eriellereshef: ”When we go to the beach, we think of water safety. And this never, ever once crossed my mind." What they want other parents to know & more. pic.twitter.com/MCvj10LXp7

— Good Morning America (@GMA) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据法庭文件显示，一名 19 岁的学生飞行员因涉嫌多次试图进入阿拉斯加航空公司一架航班的驾驶舱而面临联邦指控。
item.description:
A 19-year-old student pilot is facing a federal charge over allegedly attempting to enter the cockpit of an Alaska Airlines flight multiple times, according to court documents. https://t.co/lkyr26qSIH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 雷吉娜-金（Regina King）在 @GMA 节目中首次谈及儿子的死因，她在采访中动情地告诉罗宾-罗伯茨 "悲伤是一段旅程"。
item.description:
TOMORROW ON @GMA: Regina King speaks out for the first time on her son’s death, telling Robin Roberts in the moving interview “grief is a journey.” https://t.co/uhJyMvEw7U

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿肯色州官员本周宣布，将不再允许阿肯色州居民在州身份证上使用性别标记--以前是用 X 标记。
item.description:
Arkansas residents will no longer be allowed to use gender markers on their state identifications cards – previously noted with an X, state officials announced this week. https://t.co/9ZOCG5d3Ie

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在加利福尼亚州，10 岁的马儿娜拉掉进了一条壕沟，需要救援人员的帮助才能重新出来。现场的兽医人员宣布，在成功营救之后，娜拉健康无恙。
item.description:
After falling into a trench in California, 10-year-old horse Nala needed the help of a rescue crew to get back out.

Veterinary staff at the scene declared she was healthy and unharmed after the successful rescue operation. https://t.co/cWJf37WjJ4 pic.twitter.com/gS1yXXDyub

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 白宫新闻发言人卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）周二被问及白宫是否曾对照片进行过数字篡改。"你是在拿我们和英国的情况作比较吗？"让-皮埃尔说，"不，我们这里不做这种事。
item.description:
White House press sec. Karine Jean-Pierre was asked on Tuesday whether the White House had ever digitally altered photos.

"Are you comparing us to what's going on in the UK?" said Jean-Pierre, adding, "No, that is not something we do here." https://t.co/TO8PiKo1SS pic.twitter.com/fJbh70qS2d

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 从本周开始，美国海军陆战队中的女性将不再需要在穿制服裙时穿连裤袜，这是自 1948 年女性成为海军陆战队永久成员以来的第一次。
item.description:
Beginning this week, women in the U.S. Marines Corps will no longer be required to wear pantyhose with their uniform skirts, a first since women became a permanent part of the Marine Corps in 1948. https://t.co/8JsmLxsz5Q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在 11 月大选之前，国会山关于 TikTok 的争论正在产生奇怪的关系，模糊了意识形态的界限。
item.description:
The debate raging on Capitol Hill over TikTok is creating strange bedfellows and blurring ideological lines ahead of the November election. https://t.co/s4GNdFAHrK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普预计将于周四出庭，届时他的律师将为其联邦机密文件案的驳回进行辩护。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump is expected to be in the courtroom on Thursday when his attorneys argue for the dismissal of his federal classified documents case. https://t.co/vQ8QcSBCSf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一场大风暴将给落基山脉带来大雪和大风，这可能是丹佛三年来最大的一场暴风雪。
item.description:
A major storm set to bring heavy snow and high winds to the Rockies could be Denver's biggest snowstorm in three years. https://t.co/cxLrJB0S4T

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 负责监督亨特-拜登在特拉华州的枪支重罪案的法官暂定于 6 月 3 日对其进行审判--这距离他在洛杉矶的税务审判定于 6 月 20 日开始仅有几周时间。
item.description:
The judge overseeing Hunter Biden's felony gun case in Delaware has tentatively scheduled his trial for June 3 — just weeks before his Los Angeles-based tax trial is scheduled to begin on June 20. https://t.co/VO5XPfloO3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据警方称，阿拉巴马州一位母亲在给母亲发短信称自己被绑架并请求帮助数小时后，被发现在偏远地区的路边头部后部中弹身亡。
item.description:
An Alabama mother was found shot in the back of the head by the side of the road in a remote area, hours after she texted her mother saying that she had been kidnapped and asked for help, according to police. https://t.co/1vsoB5n1YJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据哈马斯管理的加沙卫生部称，位于拉法的联合国援助分发中心遭到炮击，五名巴勒斯坦人丧生。
item.description:
Five Palestinians killed at the U.N. aid distribution center in Rafah that was hit by shelling, according to the Hamas-run Gaza Ministry of Health. https://t.co/VghXq1kXkA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在北卡罗来纳州达勒姆 40 号州际公路某处神秘失踪后，一只 100 岁的巨鳄鳄龟在逃。

item.title: 据卫生官员称，一名新墨西哥州男子死于鼠疫，这是自 2020 年以来该州首次有人死于鼠疫。
item.description:
A New Mexico man has died from plague in the state's first human fatality from the disease since 2020, according to health officials. https://t.co/Zqqmq0XC2c pic.twitter.com/3PkEEyr50w

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 自上周以来，住在芝加哥一家移民收容所的七人麻疹检测呈阳性，这促使美国疾病预防控制中心派出一个小组，指导市和州官员应对这些感染。
item.description:
Seven people living at a Chicago shelter for migrants have tested positive for measles since last week, prompting the arrival of a team with the CDC to guide city and state officials' response to the infections. https://t.co/ZynXOHW1KE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据联邦检察官称，在堪萨斯城酋长队超级碗集会上发生的大规模枪击事件中，据称有 12 人挥舞枪支，至少 6 人开枪。
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：陪审团已开始审议詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）一案，他被控因其儿子于 2021 年 11 月在密歇根州高中开枪而犯有过失杀人罪。
item.description:
LATEST: The jury has begun deliberating in the trial of James Crumbley, who is charged with involuntary manslaughter in connection with his son opening fire at his Michigan high school in November 2021. https://t.co/ScV6wqrbkF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美元树和家庭美元连锁折扣店在财报中意外宣布第四季度亏损，此后，1000 家美元树和家庭美元连锁店的大门即将关闭。
item.description:
Doors are closing for 1,000 Dollar Tree and Family Dollar locations after the discount variety store chain announced an unexpected surprise fourth-quarter loss in its earnings report. https://t.co/Twtp0wH6sk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 纽约市警方表示，他们正在通缉一名涉嫌上个月在地铁站向人们 "投掷点燃的易燃液体容器 "的嫌疑人。

item.title: 作家、《底特律自由新闻报》专栏作家米奇-阿尔博姆（Mitch Albom）和其他九人在访问一个孤儿院时被困在这个饱受暴力蹂躏的加勒比国家，后被直升机从海地救出。
item.description:
Author and Detroit Free Press columnist Mitch Albom and nine others have been rescued by helicopter from Haiti after becoming stranded in the violence-torn Caribbean nation while visiting an orphanage. https://t.co/fNf5DdWMlT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在从 Spotify 撤下所有音乐两年后，尼尔-杨宣布将重新在流媒体服务上播放他的音乐。

Two years after he pulled all his music from Spotify, Neil Young has announced he's putting his music back on the streaming service. https://t.co/R4Wro2uNMJ pic.twitter.com/tDi2XSwUDl

item.title: 拜登总统在获得民主党候选人提名一天后，将于周三访问选区威斯康星州，继续他的竞选活动。
item.description:
Pres. Biden is continuing his campaign ramp-up with a visit to battleground Wisconsin on Wednesday, a day after he clinched the Democratic nomination. https://t.co/WuUSbBFNP1

item.title: 亨特-拜登拒绝了在美国共和党的弹劾调查中公开作证的邀请--但他表示，如果特朗普家庭成员愿意，他也会出席类似的听证会。
item.description:
Hunter Biden declined an invitation to testify in public in the GOP's impeachment inquiry — but said he'd attend a similar hearing if a member of the Trump family would. https://t.co/ZtkYujwOI3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 奥莉瓦-蒙恩公开了她与乳腺癌近一年的私下斗争，并透露她已经接受了四次手术，包括双乳切除术。
item.description:
Oliva Munn is opening up about her nearly year-long private battle with breast cancer and revealed that she has undergone four surgeries, including a double mastectomy. https://t.co/IwRY9lUp4q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024
